      • checkMove

        public boolean checkMove​(Board board,
                         Coordinates coordinates)
        Checks if the move is valid or not. Returns true if Spot on the provided Coordinates is Spot.EMPTY Returns false if Spot on the provided Coordinates is not Spot.EMPTY
        Specified by:
        checkMove in interface Player
        Parameters:
        board - 6x6 board composed of 4 squares each 3x3
        coordinates - x,y pair
        Returns:
        true if move is valid or false
        Requires
        board != null, coordinates != null
        Ensures
        boolean == true || boolean == false
